apps.name: Feather
apps.localizedDescription: Feather is a free on-device iOS application manager/installer, using certificates part of the Apple Developer Program.

apps.name: Eevee Spotify
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

apps.name: Watusi
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: The all-in-one tweak for WhatsApp Messenger!

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you connect to supported Bluetooth devices
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: ‚ÄéIf you always allow access to your location, you can choose to share your live location, and it will update even when you're not using the app. This also lets you send your current location or a nearby place.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you use Siri to quickly send and read messages and make calls.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you make video calls, take photos, and record videos.
privacy.NSRemindersUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you set reminders to call your friends back.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you connect to supported Bluetooth devices
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you save photos and videos to your library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis will let you use WhatsApp to place and receive calls through devices that are on the same Wi-Fi or local access networks.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: WhatsApp does on-device recognition for Voice Messages. In this mode, no voice data is sent to Apple despite this alert, which is unexpected. Select "Don't Allow" and report to WhatsApp.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you send your current location or nearby places in chats.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you create events on your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you make calls, send voice messages, and record videos with sound.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you send your current location or nearby places in chats.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: ‚ÄéUse Face ID to authenticate on WhatsApp.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: ‚ÄéIf you always allow access to your location, you can choose to share your live location, and it will update even when you're not using the app. If you only allow access while using the app, you can only send your current location or a nearby place.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: ‚ÄéUpload your contacts to WhatsApp's servers to help you quickly get in touch with your friends and help us provide a better experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ‚ÄéThis lets you send photos and videos from your library and save the ones you capture.

apps.name: Dopamine
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription:
A jailbreak for arm64 (A8 - A11) and arm64e (A12 - A16, M1 - M2)
Supported on devices on iOS 15.0 - 16.6.1*

apps.name: PojavLauncher
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: A flexible, fast and open-source Minecraft Java Edition launcher for Android and iOS

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: PojavLauncher uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer and LAN servers.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: PojavLauncher uses the microphone to enable support for voice chat mods.

apps.name: DebToIPA
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: Convert .deb apps to .ipa files, on iOS, locally

apps.name: haptics
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: Haptics is a simple little App to Test Haptics available with the Swift Package "HapticEase" and create + copy code for it with ease, it also has a quick little guide on how to add the Package and it's Haptics to your Project!

apps.name: Browser
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: visionOS Style Browser Built with SwiftUI and WebView

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: visionOS Style New Tab Background using Live Camera Feed

apps.name: New OS
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: iOS 11 Experience in an app.

privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: To Use Contacts In New OS

apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: UTM is a full featured system emulator and virtual machine host for iOS and macOS. It is based off of QEMU. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Linux, and more on your Mac, iPhone, and iPad.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: The virtual machine may access the local network. UTM may also use the network to communicate with local servers.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Permission is required for any virtual machine to record from the microphone.

apps.name: FL Studio Mobile
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: FL Studio Mobile is a digital audio workstation available for Android, iOS and Windows UWP.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: FL Studio Mobile uses Bluetooth to discover Bluetooth MIDI devices.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: FL Studio Mobile uses Bluetooth to discover Bluetooth MIDI devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: FL Studio Mobile uses networking to communicate with Audiobus and other music apps.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: FL Studio Mobile uses the microphone for recording vocal & instrument tracks.

apps.name: ScreenSaver
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: Apple ScreenSaver without Demo Unit.

apps.name: PostBox
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: PostBox brings the latest jailbreak news to your fingertips. Use PostBox to access your favorite packages and repositories while unjailbroken, all without the hassle of constantly searching on the web. With in-app .deb download and extraction, you can install themes using only your phone.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Please allow PostBox to save media into your photo library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PostBox can save media (such as screenshots and banners) to your photo library.

apps.name: iDevice Toolkit
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: A powerful iOS tweaking and customization tool for iOS 16.0 ‚Äì 18.3.2, powered by CVE-2025-24203.

apps.name: TrollInstallerX
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription:
TrollInstallerX is a universal TrollStore installer. It focuses on being extremely reliable and easy to use. It is also very fast, being able to install TrollStore and/or its persistence helper in a matter of seconds on the latest devices.

TrollInstallerX supports all devices running iOS 14.0 - 16.6.1, both arm64 and arm64e.

apps.name: ClassicPlayer
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription:
ClassicPlayer - The Clickwheel Music Player

Relive the good old days where listening to music was simple. Introducing ClassicPlayer, a music player that emulates the classic music player experience on your iPhone or iPod Touch!

ClassicPlayer provides a simple, easy to use interface that makes listening to music a breeze! Simply open the app, slide your finger around, and listen to your favorite tunes!

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Classic Player needs access to your library in order to work properly.

apps.name: OldOS
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: iOS 4 beautifully rebuilt in SwiftUI

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: To view, play, and experience your music in OldOS, please enable access to your music library.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take photos in OldOS, please enable access to your camera.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: To view and manage your contacts in OldOS, please enable access to your contacts list.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location. Then close and re-open the Maps app.

privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location. Then close and re-open the Maps app.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: To record your audio while filming a video in OldOS, please in enable microphone access.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access. Then close and re-open the Photos app.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access. Then close and re-open the Photos app.
